Posts.Content: ok,that is a agressive cancer, usually stage 111 or1V.  Says it is more common in Africian American woman.  I am sure you have researched it. Says one should consider seeing a doctor who specializes in that particular cancer.  Have you also considered Clinical Trials, that too is highly recommended for such.  You can call NCI national cancer Institute 1 800-4-cancer.   Again, thoughts with you all.... Here is you need to talk.  Sandy

Posts.Content: Hi Rick.  Sandy Julia here, better known as Sandy.  I am so sorry to hear about your wife with her agressive breast cancer.  I am pleased that you are going to try the  herb from the amizons, as I said before, I am not a believer of Chemo or radiation. I will check out the web sight.  Good luck with your wife.  Sandy
